title: Root
body:
$ list
bin/
dev/
usr/
> 
<<enable Dialogue shiftleft>>
-> DEBUG <<if $debug is true>>
    [[DEBUG]]
-> changedir bin
    [[Bin]]
-> changedir dev
    [[Dev]]
-> changedir usr
    [[Usr]]
-> exit
    System is shutting down now!
   <<exit Dialogue>>

title: Usr
body:
$ list
dcrease/
droskow/
mbishop/
root/
> 
-> changedir dcrease <<if $dcrease_readable is true>>
    [[Usr.Dcrease]]
-> changedir dcrease <<if $dcrease_readable is false>>
    ERR: User dcrease has a protected
    home directory!
    [[Usr]]
-> changedir droskow
    [[Usr.Droskow]]
-> changedir mbishop
    [[Usr.Mbishop]]
-> changedir root <<if $root_readable is true>>
    [[Usr.Root]] 
-> changedir root <<if $root_readable is true>>
    ERR: User root has a protected
    home directory!
    [[Usr]]
-> changedir ..
    [[Root]]

title: Alarmtest
body:
<<start DoomClock 30>>
Sounding alarm in 30 seconds!
Press 'R' to reset.
Press 'S' to stop.

-> Press 'R'
    [[Alarmtest]]
-> Press 'S'
    <<stop DoomClock>>
    Alarm cancelled!
    [[Bin]]

title: Dev
body:
$ list
invert.exe
led.exe
>
-> run invert.exe <<if $dev_done is false and $computer_led_1 is false and $computer_led_2 is false and $computer_led_3 is false>>
    Expected: 5
    Value: 0
    ERR[0x102] Unexpected value!
    [[Dev]]
-> run invert.exe <<if $dev_done is false and $computer_led_1 is false and $computer_led_2 is false and $computer_led_3 is true>>
    Expected: 5
    Value: 1
    ERR[0x102] Unexpected value!
    [[Dev]]
-> run invert.exe <<if $dev_done is false and $computer_led_1 is false and $computer_led_2 is true and $computer_led_3 is false>>
    Expected: 5
    Value: 2
    ERR[0x102] Unexpected value!
    [[Dev]]
-> run invert.exe <<if $dev_done is false and $computer_led_1 is false and $computer_led_2 is true and $computer_led_3 is true>>
    Expected: 5
    Value: 3
    ERR[0x102] Unexpected value!
    [[Dev]]
-> run invert.exe <<if $dev_done is false and $computer_led_1 is true and $computer_led_2 is false and $computer_led_3 is false>>
    Expected: 5
    Value: 4
    ERR[0x102] Unexpected value!
    [[Dev]]
-> run invert.exe <<if $dev_done is false and $computer_led_1 is true and $computer_led_2 is false and $computer_led_3 is true>>
    Expected: 5
    Value: 5
    Installing invert utility... done.
    <<enable Dialogue invert>>
    <<set $dev_done to true>>
    [[Dev]]
-> run invert.exe <<if $dev_done is false and $computer_led_1 is true and $computer_led_2 is true and $computer_led_3 is false>>
    Expected: 5
    Value: 6
    ERR[0x102] Unexpected value!
    [[Dev]]
-> run invert.exe <<if $dev_done is false and $computer_led_1 is true and $computer_led_2 is true and $computer_led_3 is true>>
    Expected: 5
    Value: 7
    ERR[0x102] Unexpected value!
    [[Dev]]
-> run led.exe 0 0 <<if $computer_led_1 is true>>
    <<set $computer_led_1 to false>>
    LED0 state: disabled
    [[Dev]]
-> run led.exe 0 1 <<if $computer_led_1 is false>>
    <<set $computer_led_1 to true>>
    LED0 state: enabled
    [[Dev]]
-> run led.exe 1 0 <<if $computer_led_2 is true>>
    <<set $computer_led_2 to false>>
    LED1 state: disabled
    [[Dev]]
-> run led.exe 1 1 <<if $computer_led_2 is false>>
    <<set $computer_led_2 to true>>
    LED1 state: enabled
    [[Dev]]
-> run led.exe 2 0 <<if $computer_led_3 is true>>
    <<set $computer_led_3 to false>>
    LED2 state: disabled
    [[Dev]]
-> run led.exe 2 1 <<if $computer_led_3 is false>>
   <<set $computer_led_3 to true>>
    LED2 state: enabled
   [[Dev]]
-> changedir ..
   [[Root]]

title: Hack1
body:
<<setpuzzle Dialogue hack1>>
Enter password:
0x[$puzzle_target]
0x[$puzzle_active]
>
-> COMMANDS
    [[Hack1]]
-> ABORT
    <<clearpuzzle Dialogue>>
    [[Usr.Root]]
-> SUCCESS
    [[Hack1.Success]]
-> FAILURE
    [[Hack1.Failure]]

title: Usr.Root
body:
$ list
passwords.txt.enc
>
-> run hack passwords.txt.enc <<if $hackboy_hack_path is true>>
    [[Hack1]]
-> open passwords.txt.enc
    --- BEGIN ENCRYPTED DATA ---
    CE C0 95 C5 F8 25 B0 24 38 A3 
    58 5E DA 89 3E EF 9D 8B 1B 44
    EF 2A AD F1 94 E9 FE 82 29 F8
    F0 8B A2 DF 5B F0
    --- END ENCRYPTED DATA ---
    [[Usr.Root]]
-> changedir ..
    [[Usr]]

title: Pokemans
body:
Pokemans.exe
============
Copyright 1980 Donald Crease

Objective: Identify and catalogue
every Pokeman!

<<set $pokeman_collected to 0>>
[[Pokemans.Loop]]

title: Bin
body:
$ list 
alarmtest.exe
hack.exe
>
-> run alarmtest.exe
    [[Alarmtest]]
-> run hack.exe
    Nothing to hack! 
    <<if $hackboy_hack_path is false>>hack command is missing from $PATH!<<endif>>
    <<if $hackboy_hack_path is true>>Try running from other locations.<<endif>>
    <<set $show_hackboy_hack_path to true>>
    [[Bin]]
-> update PATH /bin/hack <<if $hackboy_hack_path is false and $show_hackboy_hack_path is true>>
    Done.
    <<set $hackboy_hack_path to true>>
    [[Bin]]
-> changedir ..
    [[Root]]

title: DEBUG
body:
-> Toggle Debug State Display
   <<toggle DebugTextView>>
   [[DEBUG]]
-> State: hack1
   <<set $hackboy_hack_path to true>>
   <<set $visited_pokemans to true>>
   <<set $hacked_pokemans to true>>
   [[Usr.Root]]
-> State: pokemans
   [[Pokemans]]
-> Back
   [[Root]]

title: Pokemans.Loop
body:
You have collected [$pokeman_collected] Pokemen.
<<if $pokeman_collected is 0>>
> A wild Manotaur appears!
<<endif>>
<<if $pokeman_collected is 1>>
> A wild Charmister appears!
<<endif>>
<<if $pokeman_collected is 2>>
> A wild Brodude appears!
<<endif>>
<<if $pokeman_collected is 3>>
> A wild Pikachim appears!
<<endif>>
<<if $pokeman_collected is 4>>
> A wild Mantwo appears!
<<endif>>
-> Collect!! <<if $pokeman_collected is 0>>
    <<set $pokeman_collected to 1>>
    Got it!
    [[Pokemans.Loop]]
-> Collect! <<if $pokeman_collected is 1>>
    <<set $pokeman_collected to 2>>
    Oooo boy got another!
    [[Pokemans.Loop]]
-> Collect <<if $pokeman_collected is 2>>
    <<set $pokeman_collected to 3>>
    Pokemans everywhere!
    [[Pokemans.Loop]]
-> Collect... <<if $pokeman_collected is 3>>
    <<set $pokeman_collected to 4>>
    I'll give anything to see something 
    other than a Pokeman.
    [[Pokemans.Loop]]
-> Ugh, collect already <<if $pokeman_collected is 4>>
    <<set $pokeman_collected to 5>>
    [[Pokemans.Win]]
-> Don't collect
    You missed it!
    [[Pokemans.Loop]]
-> Quit
    [[Usr.Mbishop]]

title: Pokemans.Win
body:
You collected all [$pokeman_collected] Pokemans!
A new high score!
Enter your initials:
> 

-> '); SET READABLE $HOME; --
    ERR: Output is "SUCCESS: Set
    /usr/dcrease world-readable"
    Stopping pokemans.exe
    <<set $dcrease_readable to true>>
    [[Usr.Mbishop]]
